snippet: The World Health Organization has named as essential three medicines developed by a group that has its sights on neglected diseases.
abstract: Medicines for malaria, Chagas and sleeping sickness are named essential drugs by World Health Organization, scoring victory for 10-year-old program to develop drugs for 'neglected' diseases.
lead_paragraph: The World Health Organization has named as essential three medicines developed by a group that has its sights on neglected diseases.

headline.main: W.H.O. Recognition Is Boost for New Drugs
headline.print_headline: W.H.O. Recognition Is Boost for New Drugs
